title: Runtime error. Error 126 in output files. Permission denied over sh executable files

content.raw:
segway --num-labels=4 train test.genomedata traindir
 traindir/observations/chr21.0000.float32 (9411193, 9595548)
____ PROGRAM ENDED SUCCESSFULLY WITH STATUS 0 AT Tuesday November 22 2016, 15:36:50 CET ____
running locally 1: emt0.0.0.traindir.1ac69340b0c111e6a5ac989096c35828 ()
running locally 2: emt0.0.0.traindir.1ac69340b0c111e6a5ac989096c35828 ()
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/segway", line 11, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/segway/run.py", line 3030, in main
    return runner()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/segway/run.py", line 2823, in __call__
    self.run(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/segway/run.py", line 2790, in run
    self.run_train()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/segway/run.py", line 2334, in run_train
    instance_params = run_train_func(self.num_segs_range)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/segway/run.py", line 2343, in run_train_singlethread
    res = [self.run_train_instance()]
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/segway/run.py", line 2222, in run_train_instance
    round_index, kwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/segway/run.py", line 2229, in progress_train_instance
    self.run_train_round(self.instance_index, round_index, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/segway/run.py", line 2173, in run_train_round
    restartable_jobs.wait()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/segway/cluster/__init__.py", line 306, in wait
    self.process_job(jobid, job_info)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/segway/cluster/__init__.py", line 258, in process_job
    (jobid, job_name, error_filename))
RuntimeError: 
Submitted Job (2) failed. Failed Job: emt0.0.0.traindir.1ac69340b0c111e6a5ac989096c35828.
